text: [Ej pajomʙar] In [xaʙar] az xaʙarhoi ƣajʙest, ki ʙa tu vahj mekunem va tu hangome ki [ulamoi mazhaʙi jahud] qalamhoi xudro [ʙaroi qur'akaşī ʙa oʙ] meafkandand, to [ta'jin kunand, ki] kadom jak sarparastii Marjamro ʙa uhda girad, nazdaşon naʙudī; va [niz] vaqte ki [ʙa sari in mavzū'] ʙo jakdigar kaşmakaş mekardand, kanoraşon huzur nadoştī
